title: anyone else think supports are too op?
body: they dominated season 6 and 7 and now it looks like they're causing more problems in season 8. i don't understand why supports have been allowed to be so op yet so easy to play at the same time, why are they so rewarding when you can basically just sit back and read a book while playing them? they're the reason adcs have gotten nerfed so hard, and i think that's unfair since adcs were already underpowered to begin with.
